Name: Yerevan
Description: The capital and largest city of Armenia, a cultural and economic hub with rich history.

Name: Gyumri
Description: A major city in northern Armenia, known for its historical significance and as an important cultural center.

Name: Vanadzor
Description: A city in northern Armenia, known for its industrial and cultural significance.

Name: Vagharshapat
Description: An ancient city and religious center, known for being the seat of the Armenian Apostolic Church.

Name: Kapan
Description: A city in the southern part of Armenia, known for its mining industry and proximity to the Iranian border.

Name: Armavir
Description: A city in western Armenia, known for its agricultural production and historical landmarks.

Name: Ararat
Description: A region in Armenia, home to the legendary Mount Ararat, with agricultural land and historical sites.

Name: Gegharkunik
Description: A region known for its mountainous terrain, beautiful lakes, and proximity to Lake Sevan.

Name: Lori
Description: A northern region known for its natural beauty, including forests, rivers, and historical landmarks.

Name: Syunik
Description: A southern region, known for its mountainous landscapes and its border with Azerbaijan and Iran.
